product.description: You can thank the Endurance Road Geometry, shaped seatstays with Zertz, and FACT carbon fork (also with vibration-absorbing Zertz), for the Secteur Expert Disc's fast and comfortable ride over the long haul. Perfect for a Gran Fondo or epic weekend ride, the 10-speed Shimano 105 compact drivetrain, powerful disc brakes, and upgraded wheelset are not only efficient and reliableâ€”they'll help you cover and discover new places by bike.

bullets.bullet: E5 Premium Aluminium disc frame with Zertz inserts, OSBB, and ample tyre clearance provides a lightweight, confident, compliant ride for any adventure
FACT carbon disc-specific fork provides ample tyre clearance and the best balance of strength, stiffness, and compliance for a confident ride
Durable AXIS 4.0 Disc wheelset with wide rim for tyre volume and contact, plus sealed cartridge bearing hub
Specialized Comp shallow drop alloy bar for serious performance; wrapped with non-slip Specialized Roubaix tape for vibration-damping
Smooth, precise Shimano 105 STI shifters are renowned for their race-ready performance and exceptional value

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized E5 Premium Aluminium disc w/ Zertz inserts, smooth welds, OSBB
specs.fork: FORK Specialized disc FACT carbon monocoque w/ Zertz inserts, alloy steerer/crown, fender fittings
specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
specs.stem: STEM Specialized Elite-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp
specs.tape: TAPE Specialized Roubaix, w/ 2.5mm gel pads, bar shapers
specs.front_brake: FRONT BRAKE Avid BB7, mechanical disc, 160mm rotor
specs.rear_brake: REAR BRAKE Avid BB7, mechanical disc, 140mm rotor
specs.crankset: CRANKSET FSA Gossamer, 10-speed compact, alloy rings
specs.pedals: PEDALS Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
specs.front_tire: FRONT TYRE Specialized Espoir Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x30c
specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Espoir Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x30c
specs.saddle: SADDLE Body Geometry Riva Plus, Cr-Mo rails, 143mm
specs.seatpost: SEATPOST Specialized Pave Pro, FACT carbon w/ Zertz inserts, 27.2mm

product.description: You can thank the Endurance Road Geometry, shaped seatstays, and FACT carbon fork with vibration-absorbing Zertz, for the Secteur Elite Disc's super-smooth and responsive ride. Perfect for a Gran Fondo or epic weekend ride, the upgraded wheelset, powerful disc brakes, and 10-speed Shimano Tiagra compact drivetrain add efficiency and reliability to any road adventure.

bullets.bullet: Lightweight, A1 Premium Aluminium, smooth-welded, butted frame features hydroformed, Compliance Plus seatstays for great vertical compliance and a confident ride
Specialized FACT carbon disc fork with Zertz provides predictable steering and smooth handling
AXIS Classic Disc wheels balance weight and strength; fitted with Specialized Espoir Sport 30c tyres for a smooth ride
Specialized Comp shallow drop alloy bar for serious performance; wrapped with non-slip Specialized Roubaix tape for vibration damping
10-speed Shimano Tiagra STI shifters are smooth and precise, offering reliable performance and great value
Supportive Body Geometry Riva Plus Road saddle with Cr-Mo rails is a perfect combination of comfort and efficiency

product.description: Perfect for a Gran Fondo or epic weekend ride, the Secteur Sport Disc's Endurance Road Geometry, FACT carbon fork with vibration-absorbing Zertz, and shaped tube sets delivers a ride that's stable, smooth, and quick. The powerful disc brakes, and 9-speed Shimano Sora compact drivetrain add efficiency and reliability to any road adventure.

bullets.bullet: Lightweight, A1 Premium Aluminium, smooth-welded, butted frame features hydroformed, Compliance Plus seatstays for great vertical compliance and a confident ride
FACT carbon disc-specific fork with Zertz provides ample tyre clearance and the best balance of strength, stiffness, and compliance for a confident ride
Axis Classic Disc wheels balance weight and strength; fitted with Specialized Espoir Sport 30c tyres for a smooth ride
Specialized Comp shallow drop alloy bar for serious performance; wrapped with non-slip Specialized Roubaix tape for vibration damping
Never miss a critical shift with Shimano Sora STI shifters
Supportive Body Geometry Riva Plus Road saddle is a perfect combination of comfort and efficiency
